data.description:
PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Appended Mag + Subsistence/Overflow/Outlaw/Surplus + OfA/MKC/Rampage/Frenzy/Thresh

Surplus + Frenzy combo buff handling, reload, stability (10/20/50) and damage, handing, reload respectively (20% buff, 30 stat points. This means you can get up to 80 stat points to handling and reload and 50 to stability.

Overflow and MKC have very poor synergy with each other, with MKC unable to be procced while overflow is active. While these are both excellent perks, the combo is not worth keeping

PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Liquid Coils + Clown Cartridge/Rapid Hit/ALH/Field Prep + Demo/Vorpal/Frenzy

Frenzy and Vorpal now give the same damage bonus (15%), so it’s your choice which perk. Vorpal affects majors [champs] and bosses, Frenzy affects all enemies and gives a +50 stat bonus to reload speed but takes some time to proc
PvP: Hammer Forged/Corkscrew + Projection Fuse + Killing Wind + Demo
